title: Tadej Pogačar’s 2022 bikes go up for sale on Bike-Room, including stunning TT1 time-trial bike
content:
Cyclist
Tadej Pogačar’s 2022 bikes go up for sale on Bike-Room, including stunning TT1 time-trial bike

You can now buy bikes once owned by pro cycling’s GOAT, Tadej Pogačar, and his UAE Team Emirates teammates.

Bike-Room, one of the world’s foremost sellers of ex-pro bikes, now has a fleet of UAE’s 2022 bikes, which includes Colnago V3Rs road bikes and TT1 time-trial bikes, all of which are decked out in Campagnolo componentry – including a 12-speed Super Record EPS groupset – a Deda Alanera cockpit and Prologo saddles for the full house of Italian design.

Of course the headline within that is that Tadej Pogačar’s 2022 bikes are for sale. For context, that year the Slovenian won the UAE Tour, Strade Bianche, Tirreno-Adriatico, the Tour of Slovenia, GP Montréal and Il Lombardia, and came second at the Tour de France, although that came on the ‘Prototipo’ V4Rs prototype. While riding this V3Rs it was all wins (and a rather impressive fourth in his Tour of Flanders debut).

Speaking of prototypes, the stunning TT1 time-trial bike began its own racing life as a prototype, and was tailored specifically for Pogačar. It’s super-aero with a built-in aero bottle cage and bottle, carbon praying mantis-style handlebars and an aero fork that sits in front of the head tube to extend the front end profile of the bike. Like the road bikes, it’s kitted out with a Campagnolo Super Record 12-speed groupset and Campagnolo wheels.

Because of how special and sought after this one of a kind prototype is, the TT1 will be subject to an auction on bike-room.com, with offers open from 11th-18th December.

BIkes up for sale with Bike-Room are always certified, cleaned, inspected and fine-tuned to make sure anything you’re buying is legit and in good condition.

General sale begins on 12th December, but if you sign up you can join the 24-hour early access private sale on Monday 11th December to jump the queue to the UAE Team Emirates collection.

For the full details and to sign up to the sale, visit bike-room.com/team-uae-emirates
